titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for an increase in the rates of survivors' and dependents' educational assistance payable by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Disability Assistance and Memorial Affairs.

bill.summary: 7/31/2009--Introduced. Increases the monthly rates of the educational assistance allowance payable on behalf of veterans' survivors and dependents.
